name: sendEth
description: sendEther. Send Ether to other address and allow the owner to withdraw everything.

functionDecorators.name: addAdmin
functionDecorators.description: add a new admin to the adminList (onlyAdmin can do this).

returnDecorators.description: bool to return true if ok.

functionDecorators.name: getBalance
functionDecorators.description: return the Eth balance of an address.

returnDecorators.description: uint to return the balance in wei.

functionDecorators.name: getBalanceContract
functionDecorators.description: return the Eth balance in the contract.

returnDecorators.description: uint to return the balance in wei.

functionDecorators.name: removeAdmin
functionDecorators.description: remove an admin to the adminList (onlyAdmin can do this).

returnDecorators.description: bool to return true if ok.

functionDecorators.name: sendTransac
functionDecorators.description: send some amount of ether to an address (if there is enought eth in the contract).

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: value to the amount of ether to send.

returnDecorators.description: bool to return true if ok.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawAll
functionDecorators.description: allow to withdraw the all balance of the contract split between admin.
